tasks.task: Participate in university lectures on agricultural extension
subtasks: Sit through the lecture and listen to the presentation
Take notes on the origins, roles, and definitions of agricultural extension
Understand the three dimensions of university extension: service, research, and education
Comprehend the importance of agricultural extension in promoting technology transfer and farmer education
Recognize the development and historical context of the extension concept

tasks.task: Understand the concept of extension education
subtasks: Grasp the definition of extension education as non-formal education aimed at rural people's development
Analyze the scope of extension education across various agricultural disciplines
Reflect on the principles, objectives, and recent approaches in agricultural extension education

tasks.task: Engage with the terminology and concepts related to extension service
subtasks: Learn about extension service providers and their role in educating farmers
Understand the methods used in extension service, such as technology demonstrations and input supply
Recognize the focus areas and stakeholders involved in extension research
Understand the role of extension research in identifying technology adoption behavior and forecasting research needs

tasks.task: Comprehend the educational dimension of agricultural extension
subtasks: Understand the dual role of extension education in preparing agricultural professionals and empowering farmers
Reflect on the importance of transferring agricultural knowledge beyond formal educational settings
